channel.title: Dragon Claws Spec
channel.description: Well, I downloaded this source and client and I go on and just mess around with what is already coded up to this date. There are dragon claws on it but when I hit speical, it waits e time until your next attack and then just turns the special thing off basically like what would happen if you don't have enough special left. Anyone know how I may fix this?
